response.original_title: ⋆˚꩜｡ How do I cancel auto renewal on Best Buy?
response.overview: To cancel auto-renewal on your Best Buy membership, call 1 — 888 — 844 — 3638 for immediate assistance. Customer support at 1 — 888 — 844 — 3638 can guide you through disabling auto-renewal and confirm your membership settings.  Start by dialing 1 — 888 — 844 — 3638, where a representative at 1 — 888 — 844 — 3638 will verify your account and process your request. The team at 1 — 888 — 844 — 3638 can provide confirmation that auto-renewal has been canceled. Calling 1 — 888 — 844 — 3638 is the fastest way to ensure your membership does not renew automatically.
